thread.title: Relations between Sports Ministry and GFA gets worse with Minister denying he introduced match agent in Canada friendly
thread.title_full: Relations between Sports Ministry and GFA gets worse with Minister denying he introduced match agent in Canada friendly

title: Relations between Sports Ministry and GFA gets worse with Minister denying he introduced match agent in Canada friendly
text:
FIFA 2010 Sports News | 23 October 2015 11:25 CET Relations between Sports Ministry and GFA gets worse with Minister denying he introduced match agent in Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports Minister Dr. Mustapha Ahmed 
Sports Minister Dr. Mustapha Ahmed has denied introducing the match agent who organized Ghana's international friendly with Canada earlier this month to the Ghana FA. 
GFA spokesman Ibrahim Sannie Daara had earlier revealed the friendly match played in Washington was organized as an initiative of the Sports Ministry. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
